sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-container>
      <el-header style="border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray;">
        <el-tabs v-model="activeTab" @tab-click="handleTabClick">
          <el-tab-pane label="查看买家消息" name="buyer"></el-tab-pane>
          <el-tab-pane label="查看卖家消息" name="seller"></el-tab-pane>
        </el-tabs>
      </el-header>
      <el-header style="border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray;">
        <el-notification-group v-if="activeTab === 'buyer'" :data="buyerMessages"></el-notification-group>
        <el-notification-group v-else-if="activeTab === 'seller'" :data="sellerMessages"></el-notification-group>
      </el-header>
      <el-header>
        <el-button-group>
          <el-button type="danger" @click="clearAllMessages">清除所有消息</el-button>
          <el-switch v-model="showRead" active-text="显示已读消息" inactive-text="隐藏已读消息"></el-switch>
        </el-button-group>
      </el-header>
    </el-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { ref } from "vue";
  export default {
    name:"MsgView",
    data(){
        return 
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .el-header {
    height: auto;
  }
  </style>
